title: A diode has two terminals, the anode and the cathode, which is why it’s called a diode. It restricts current flow to only one direction
Changing AC to DC is a process called rectification
A British thermal unit (BTU) is a measure of heat energy
Current is the presence of electron flow

note: An ammeter measures amps (current). An ohmmeter measures ohms (resistance). A voltmeter measures volts (voltage).
title: Electrical power is measured in watts, so you use a wattmeter
The bulb will burn dimmer because its full potential isn’t used; it’ll last longer for the same reason
